mapper.sql: id, storedef_id, c_id, palletid, m_id, production_date, num, weight, mstatus, batchno, vendor_id, customer_id, billno, bill_head_id, bill_detail_id, memo
mapper.select: select s.*,sd.*,r.*,m.*,v.*,h.*,d.* from t_asrs_store s left join t_asrs_sys_storedef sd on s.storedef_id = sd.id left join t_asrs_rack r on s.c_id = r.id left join t_asrs_sys_matdet m on s.m_id = m.id left join t_asrs_sys_vendor v on s.vendor_id = v.id left join t_asrs_bill_head h on s.bill_head_id = h.id left join t_asrs_bill_detail d on s.bill_detail_id = d.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_asrs_store (id, storedef_id, c_id, palletid, m_id, production_date, num, weight, mstatus, batchno, vendor_id, customer_id, billno, bill_head_id, bill_detail_id, memo) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storedefId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billHeadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
